definitions.definition: to take some things and leave others:
examples: Pick a card from the pack.

definitions.definition: to take some things but not others:
examples: The richest universities can pick and choose which students they take.
You can have first pick of the desserts.

definitions.definition: to have a large choice available:
examples: The plane was fairly empty so we had our pick of seats.

definitions.definition: to choose the one(s) you want from the different types available:
examples: The shirts come in five different colours - just take your pick.
